hooks.command: file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$file" == *.py ]]; then black --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null && isort --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi
file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; case "$file" in */completions/*|*/get-pip.py|*.lock) echo 'BLOCK: This is a protected file (generated/vendored/lock). Do not edit.' >&2; exit 2;; esac
